channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiOS, FortiProxy, FortiSwitchManager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiOS, FortiProxy, FortiSwitchManager

item.title: CVE-2022-40684|2024-08-03T12:21:46.541Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortios%2C%20fortiproxy%2C%20fortiswitchmanager
item.description: An authentication bypass using an alternate path or channel [CWE-288] in Fortinet FortiOS version 7.2.0 through 7.2.1 and 7.0.0 through 7.0.6, FortiProxy version 7.2.0 and version 7.0.0 through 7.0.6 and FortiSwitchManager version 7.2.0 and 7.0.0 allows an unauthenticated atttacker to perform operations on the administrative interface via specially crafted HTTP or HTTPS requests.
